mapper.sql: UID, ROLE_KEY, USER_KEY, COM_KEY, INDUSTRY_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME
mapper.delete: delete from YDZ_ROLE_USER where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and ROLE_KEY = #{roleKey} and USER_KEY = #{userKey}
mapper.insert:
insert into YDZ_ROLE_USER
UID,
ROLE_KEY,
USER_KEY,
COM_KEY,
INDUSTRY_ID,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update YDZ_ROLE_USER
ROLE_KEY = #{roleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where COM_KEY = #{comKey}
and USER_KEY = #{userKey}

update YDZ_ROLE_USER set ROLE_KEY = #{roleKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_KEY = #{userKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_KEY = #{comKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_ID = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where COM_KEY = #{comKey} and ROLE_KEY = #{roleKey} and USER_KEY = #{userKey}
